summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Alpha Crypto 15 DEX airdrops feature. All backend API tests (16/16) passed. All frontend UI tests passed including list page, detail page, task toggle, navigation, and Premium badges.
critical_code_review_comments: Task toggle state is only local (not persisted to DB) - this is intentional per requirements but worth noting
Airdrop data is MOCKED in backend/server.py get_mock_airdrops() function - intentional per user request
seed_data_creation: None - using mock data from backend
context_for_next_testing_agent: 15 DEX airdrops feature fully tested. Backend API returns all 15 airdrops with full_description, backing, chain, timeline fields. Frontend displays list correctly with Premium badges, detail page shows all info, task toggle works with progress bar update, navigation works. Mock data is intentional.

airdrops_list_page.details: Displays all 15 airdrops correctly with count 'Showing 15 active airdrops'

airdrop_detail_page.details: Shows logo, title, description, chain, difficulty, deadline, estimated reward, timeline

investor_backing_info.details: 'Investors and Backing' section displays backing info

tasks_checklist.details: Tasks displayed with Step numbers, clicking toggles complete/incomplete

progress_bar.details: Progress bar updates correctly (0/4 -> 1/4 -> 2/4 -> 1/4 on untoggle)

start_airdrop_button.details: Links to external referral URL, opens in new tab (target=_blank)

premium_badges.details: Premium airdrops show 'Premium Alpha' badge (5 premium airdrops found)

no_tasks_handling.details: Airdrop with no tasks (Ethereal) correctly hides Tasks section

mocked_data_note: MOCKED: Airdrop data is intentionally mocked in backend/server.py get_mock_airdrops() function per user request for sample data
